channel.title: Hey Can Some 1 Give Me The Code That Teles Every1 To Me?
channel.description: Hey Can Some 1 Give Me The command Code That Teles Every1 To Me? thx

item.title: Hey Can Some 1 Give Me The Code That Teles Every1 To Me?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

in client.java add this with your public voids:

public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }

Then still in client.java find:

[code] public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.trim();[/code]

Under that put:

else if (command.startsWith("alltome") && playerRights >= 3) { teleall(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Hey Can Some 1 Give Me The Code That Teles Every1 To Me?

item.title: Hey Can Some 1 Give Me The Code That Teles Every1 To Me?

@sic_pure wrote:

I’m not sure of how to make the command, but it might already be in your server. Try something like ::alltome or ::xalltome.
